entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 9.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 8:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 7.2°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:19 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:19 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
